alpha_T_clarification.resolution: Œ±_T is redshift-dependent for cosmological applications but has a fundamental value from KMS. The discrepancy between 2.7 (cosmological) and 4.5 (KMS) needs theoretical reconciliation or documentation.
alpha_T_clarification.recommendation: Add detailed note in documentation explaining the different contexts where different Œ±_T values apply
